static_methods.name: app.run
static_methods.source_code:
def run(self) -> None:
        """Continually run the watch step, sleeping for the configured
        interval after each step.
        """
        while True:
            self.run_step()
            time.sleep(self.interval)

dynamic_methods.source_code:
def run(self) -> None:
        """Continually run the watch step, sleeping for the configured
        interval after each step.
        """
        while True:
            self.run_step()
            time.sleep(self.interval)
